answerText: Lagos[10] These commercial motorcycles can be found throughout Lagos. These vehicles for hire are named for a now defunct Nigerian airline.
heading: NASAT |2012 | 1 | 5 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: In 1991 this city was replaced as its country's capital by Abuja. For 10 points each: [10] Name this most populous city in Nigeria. Many gangs composed of "area boys" demand bribes from molue drivers in this city, in which Ikoyi is located.
